content.rendered:
WINING & DINING

Embark on an extraordinary culinary journey at the Caravelle Hotel, where gastronomic excellence meets impeccable hospitality. Nestled in the heart of the city, our dining experiences are a harmonious blend of tradition and innovation, offering a diverse range of flavors to tantalize your tastes. 

From the rich heritage of Vietnamese cuisine to international delights crafted with the finest ingredients, our culinary team takes you on a delectable adventure that celebrates the essence of each dish. Whether you're savoring a gourmet meal at our fine dining restaurant or indulging in Vietnamese street food-inspired creations at our iconic Bars.

Join us at the Caravelle Saigon and let your taste buds traverse the world through our exquisite culinary offerings.

A fine-dining restaurant with a cosmopolitan outlook, Reflections’ award-winning team is dedicated to serving creative dishes from around the world to diners in the heart of Saigon. Explore our wide collection of wine and our fine dining menu.

MORE DETAIL

Our flagship restaurant Nineteen, named after our address at 19 Lam Son Square, has grown a reputation in Saigon for its unparalleled lunch and dinner buffet.

MORE DETAIL

Cafe de l’Opera is quite possibly in the best location in our city, that’s if you enjoy your views with a dash of history and a slice of modernity all rolled into one. Come nad enjoy the best coffee in Vietnam.

MORE DETAIL

If only these walls could talk. Saigon Saigon Rooftop Bar on the 10th floor of Caravelle Saigon is one of the oldest rooftop bars in town and has been with Caravelle through the entirety of our history.

MORE DETAIL

Adjoin to Reflections Restaurant is a classique Bar that offers an intimate atmosphere and some of unique flavours in town, it’s our Martini Bar.

MORE DETAIL

A handsome, contemporary corner on the ground floor of Caravelle, Tapas Kitchen is a welcoming space to catch up for a chat, enjoy a delicious bite or two, or simply relish the sensation that comes from being right in the heart of dynamic Saigon.

MORE DETAIL
